objects.text:
• Premium Bubble Solution
• Non-Toxic & Eco-Friendly
• Hours of Endless Fun
• Made in the USA

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
The banner features a vibrant and playful layout suitable for promoting a children’s product. The background is a cheerful gradient of sky blue with scattered semi-transparent white bubbles for a fun and dynamic effect. The composition is led by a bold, colorful title (`heading_1` and `heading_2`), followed by an attention-grabbing tagline (`tagline`) in bright orange to emphasize excitement. Below this, a list of product features (`description`) is laid out in clean, dark gray text with bullet points. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in thick purple text, generating visual interest. A rounded bright green call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with white text (`cta`) invites users to purchase. The right section showcases the product image (`product_image`) clearly.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: `#8ee7fa`, `#5dc1fa`
- Text Colors: `#7b10a8` (Purple), `#43bf0e` (Green), `#f9b306` (Orange), `#444444` (Dark Gray), `#FFFFFF` (White for button text)
- Accent Elements: `#43bf0e` (CTA Button)
product_color: The product image features a lively and playful color palette ideal for a fun advertisement banner. Dominant neon green (#7CFF7C) forms the base with the transparent bubble solution and bottle, evoking energy and freshness. The logo uses vivid yellow (#FFD700), deep purple (#8000BA), and electric green (#A3FF00), which are contrasted by a bold orange outline (#FF6A00), creating a vibrant and eye-catching effect. The cap is bright purple (#8000BA), matching the background label, ensuring cohesive design. Light blue (#ADD8FF) and soft lavender (#D8B4FC) bubbles add a whimsical highlight, blending seamlessly into the backdrop while maintaining visual interest and clarity.
